name: Fragment: Untitled #2
description:
Fragments is an experimental series of little game/side-projects which are freely can be anything.

Untitled #2 is a re-release of some unfinished stuff I've been working on in Darkplaces Engine a few years ago. This one was supposed to represent a space level in a game I cancelled later on. Again, nothing too special, just a short demo to wander around.

This Fragment has no ending.

Game will run in borderless mode and will use your desktop resolution and refresh rate.

System requirements:

  • Windows PC
  • ~55 Mb free disk space
